doc.title: Country of the Month Archives - Fridays For Future
doc.excerpt: Every month we feature an unusual new FFF Country…and perhaps over time add their story as well (Pase II).

main.p: As Greta inspires a world revolution, one young Ugandan is bringing the climate fight home (read article).
main.head: Category: Country of the Month
main.p: Every month we feature an unusual new FFF Country…and perhaps over time add their story as well (Pase II).
